title: and of the Council of 16 April 20143 hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 24th day of August

title: and of the Council of 16 April 20143 hereby make the following regulations:
and of the Council of 16 April 20143 hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 3. Section 87(1B) (amended by section 41 of the Circular Economy and
text_raw:
3. Section 87(1B) (amended by section 41 of the Circular Economy and 
Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No 26 of 2022)) of the Environmental 
Protection Agency Act 1992 (No.7 of 1992) is amended by the deletion of “by 
or on behalf of a Minister of the Government”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 August 2022. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

1 O.J. No. L334 17.12.2010, p 17 
2 O.J. No. L26, 28.1.2012, p.1 
3 O.J. No. L24, 25.4.2014, p.1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd August, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [421] 3
